title: Implement Error Reporting Service
description: Create a comprehensive error reporting service that handles all types of Flutter errors.
instructions:
Build an ErrorReportingService class that:

1. Has an initialize() method that sets up FlutterError.onError and PlatformDispatcher.instance.onError
2. Only reports errors in release mode (use kReleaseMode)
3. Has a setUser() method to set user ID for crash context
4. Has a logBreadcrumb() method to log navigation/action breadcrumbs
5. Has a reportError() method for manually reporting caught exceptions
6. Uses FirebaseCrashlytics for the actual reporting

hints.text: Use kReleaseMode from package:flutter/foundation.dart to check the build mode
FlutterError.onError accepts a callback that receives FlutterErrorDetails
PlatformDispatcher.instance.onError should return true to indicate the error was handled

commonMistakes.consequence: Dashboard gets polluted with development crashes
commonMistakes.correction: Always check kReleaseMode before reporting to the crash service

commonMistakes.consequence: Errors from isolates and platform channels are missed
commonMistakes.correction: Set up PlatformDispatcher.instance.onError in addition to FlutterError.onError
